title: [娱乐]Torch Light —— 左键/右键火把开启夜视~[1.7.x]
author: 西木凛
txt_content:
= 使用 =
左键/右键火把开启夜视，只有一个权限torch.use 有torch.use权限的可以使用这个插件


原文（未汉化）,知道上面的使用就可以了What is Torch Light?Torch Light is a simple plugin that adds a greater use to  torches on your Minecraft server! It can also be used as a great feature as a perk for Donators  on your server.
What does it do?So when you have any amount of torch(s) in your inventory you  can use this plugin. Basically if you are holding a torch in your hand and left  click with it you get a potion of night vision. If you want to turn it off the just left click with any item  that is not a torch (Such as no item in your hand, wood, seeds, etc.)
Commands and PermissionsThere are NO commands for Torch Light! But there is one  permission.torch.use - allow the player to use  Torches.


楼主发现的BUG可能会让喝的夜视药水失效~
